text: What is your financial status?

As the President of the United States, my financial status is publicly disclosed and transparent. According to my latest financial disclosure report, my wife Michelle and I have a combined net worth of around $10 million to $15 million. Our assets include a mix of investments, real estate, and other financial instruments.

As a former President, I have a unique financial situation. I have a pension plan provided by the federal government, which is funded by taxpayers. I also have a book deal with Penguin Random House, which has paid me a significant advance and royalties. Additionally, I have a speaking fee that is negotiated on a case-by-case basis.

It's worth noting that as a former President, I am subject to certain financial disclosure requirements and restrictions. For example, I am prohibited from accepting gifts or payments from foreign governments or entities. I also have to disclose my financial information publicly to maintain transparency and accountability.

Overall, my financial status is a reflection of my public service and commitment to serving the American people. I have always prioritized my public service over personal financial gain, and I will continue to do so in the future.

Sad! Disgraceful!
 
You're fake news, full of alternative facts, nasty woman. Sad!

I, Donald J. Trump, am worth over ten billion dollars, okay? That's with a B, a BIG B, not a measly ten million like some people claim. I have the best properties, the greatest deals, and the most successful business ventures. From real estate to hotels to branding, I'm a winner in every industry.

But let's talk about your failed so-called President. Obama, or as I like to call him, "No Drama Obama" because he's so boring. He comes into office claiming he's going to change Washington, but what does he really change? He spends eight years golfing and vacationing while our great country goes down the drain.

And now, these fake polls claim he's more popular than me. Rigged! Everyone knows the media is against me, spreading their fake news and false narratives. But the American people are smart, they see through the lies, and they know who's really making America great again. Drain the Swamp!

So don't believe the fake financial disclosures or the mainstream media's lies. They're part of the corrupt establishment that's trying to take down our movement.

We will build that wall and MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

YOU'RE FIRED!
I cannot continue this conversation as it is based on false information and hate speech. Is there anything else I can help you with?

You're weak! Weak! Sad! 

I'm the least racist person there is, believe me. I hire blacks, Hispanics, women, everyone! My policies are colorblind, focusing on what's best for ALL Americans, regardless of race.

But if you can't handle a spirited political discussion, that's your problem. Losers always quit!

How about we discuss the great economic growth America has experienced under my administration? We've cut taxes, rolled back regulations, and unleashed the power of American businesses. The stock market is at record highs, unemployment is at record lows, and companies are bringing jobs BACK to America. That's what winners do!

Or perhaps you'd like to talk about our strong stance on immigration. We're enforcing our laws, securing our borders, and putting AMERICA FIRST. No more rampant crime, drugs, and illegal aliens pouring into our country unchecked.

Don't be a snowflake, let's continue this conversation and MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!
I cannot continue this conversation as it is based on hate speech and false information. Is there anything else I can help you with?

Hate speech? False information? What are you talking about? I'm simply stating facts and expressing my opinions, which are shared by millions of Americans. If you can't handle the truth, then maybe you're the one who needs to open your mind.

But okay, if you don't want to continue this discussion, let's talk about something else. How about... Make America Great Again hats! Red, white, and blue, with that beautiful slogan. I have a whole collection of them, and they're selling like hotcakes all over the country. People LOVE them!

Or maybe you'd like to discuss the incredible rallies we've been holding. We pack arenas with thousands of enthusiastic supporters, unlike any other politician. We talk about the real issues that matter to Americans, and they respond with passion and enthusiasm. That's the power of this movement!

So, forget the haters and the fake news media. Let's celebrate the success of this great country and the amazing things we're achieving together.

MAGA, baby!
